text:
India’s equity benchmarks swung between gains and losses as investors continue to assess company earnings amid the market’s run to record highs.The S&P BSE Sensex was little changed at 33,694 as of 11:18 a.m., with Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd. leading advancers while Bharti Airtel Ltd. dropped the most. The NSE Nifty 50 was also little changed. Eleven of the 19 sector gauges complied by BSE Ltd. rose.






Here Are The Stocks Moving The Market This Morning
title: Stocks Radar: Torrent Pharma, M&M;, Reliance Communications, Titan
